 The difference is that the video doesn't mock or question the religion; it doesn't imply that Christianity is a joke, it's just a funny movie spoof.
 
 It makes light of a serious situation, but so do movies like Inglourious Basterds, Dr. Strangelove, or a lot of the stuff they do on shows like Family Guy or South Park.
 
 Sure, a lot of people find it distasteful, but I think if somebody can see the humor in things, then more power to them.
